column4: I am new to Ubuntu as a graphical OS. When I minimize windows they seem to disappear
How do I get them to show like at the bottom of the screen
this is what you want to do here:  http://linuxfud.wordpress.com/2007/02/14/how-to-reset-ubuntugnome-settings-to-defaults-without-re-installing/
then restart gmd using sudo /etc/init.d/gdm restart
